local_intent: Execute grasp: verify pose is available, approach and align to the green glass bottle, perform pinch grasp at goal_pose, close gripper, and confirm stable grasp.
assumptions: gripper is open prior to grasp
coherence_with_global: Matches the grasp phase of the GLOBAL_BT using the same pose_key 'goal_pose' and strategy 'pinch', includes approach/alignment before grasp and stability verification after closing.
